overview: The current official “Holocaust” story is that Treblinka is the largest mass burial site in the entire  world, where the Germans gassed 900,000 Jews. Between 2012 and 2014, British Archaeologist Dr. Sturdy Colls conducted investigations on the grounds of the former Treblinka camp claiming to refute revisionist claims that the Treblinka story is a hoax. This film exposes Dr. Sturdy Colls’s investigations as a massive fraud.  For instance, her research actually included digging near clearly marked Christian graves; she also falsely assigned homicidal intent to a normal life-saving bath and disinfection complex.
title: The Treblinka Archaeology Hoax
